content: this listing is for an instant download crochet pattern - you will not receive a physical item this crochet pattern will help you create a drawstring backpack for kids using heart granny squares the granny squares have solid heart centres and are sewn together to create a bag for little girls yarn weight aran / worsted/ #4 brand drops paris uni colour yarn a white 189 yards b various 239 yards total 428 yards supplies 5mm crochet hook worsted weight yarn scissors sewing needle skill recommend skill level is intermediate the pattern is written in usa terminology you will need to know basic crochet stitches single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet dtr you ll also need to know how to work into a magic_ring and back loops sewing skills are required to complete the pattern sewing lessons are not included the pattern is 6 pages long and includes gauge instructions and lots of progress photos a free basic version of this crochet pattern is available on https //hookfully com/ due to the nature of the product no refunds will be issued
